# disconnect()

**Instance Method**

Disconnect from the device

## Declaration

```swift
func disconnect()
```

## Discussion

Disconnects from the device, closes the SCO and service level connection if they are connected. Delegate methods will be called once the disconnection is complete.
title: disconnect()
